statements: UPDATE Farming_Equipment SET equipment_name = 'Tractor', equipment_type = 'Agricultural', gps_latitude = 40.7128, gps_longitude = -74.0060 WHERE equipment_id = 1
UPDATE Farming_Equipment SET last_update_timestamp = NOW(), last_known_location = 'FarmA' WHERE equipment_id = 2
UPDATE Farming_Equipment SET equipment_name = 'Harvesting Machine', last_known_location = 'Field A', last_update_timestamp = '2021-10-25 08:30:00' WHERE equipment_id = 101;
UPDATE Farming_Equipment SET gps_latitude = 37.7749, gps_longitude = -122.4194, last_known_location = 'Warehouse B' WHERE equipment_id = 102;
UPDATE equipment_location SET latitude = 40.7128, longitude = -74.0060 WHERE equipment_id = 1;
UPDATE equipment_movement SET speed = 25.5, direction = 'North' WHERE equipment_id IN (SELECT equipment_id FROM equipment_location WHERE latitude > 40.7);
UPDATE equipment_location SET latitude = 33.739, longitude = -118.410, location_timestamp = '2021-10-15 15:30:00' WHERE equipment_id = 101;
UPDATE equipment_movement SET direction = 'South', speed = 25.5, movement_timestamp = '2021-10-15 15:45:00' WHERE movement_id = 201;
UPDATE equipment SET equipment_name = 'Excavator', location_latitude = 40.7128, location_longitude = -74.0060 WHERE equipment_id = 1;
UPDATE movement_history SET speed = 20.5, direction = 'North' WHERE equipment_id = 2;
UPDATE equipment SET equipment_name='Updated Equipment 1' WHERE equipment_id=1;
UPDATE GPS_data SET latitude=12.345678, longitude=98.765432 WHERE gps_id=10;
UPDATE Equipment SET equipment_type = 'Tractor' WHERE equipment_id = 1;
UPDATE GPSData SET gps_speed = 10.5, gps_lat = -34.056789, gps_long = 150.987654 WHERE gps_id = 1;
